step.name: README
step.action: tsenv.exe "README=This task sequence shows how to use PowerCFG.exe to set a device to use High Performance Power Plan. Other options are here https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/design/device-experiences/powercfg-command-line-options. The task sequence can also be set to run with High Performance set via the Task Sequence Properties Performance tab, that sets the device to use High Performance for the duration of the task sequence." /hiddenflag:False

defaultVarList.variable: This task sequence shows how to use PowerCFG.exe to set a device to use High Performance Power Plan. Other options are here https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/design/device-experiences/powercfg-command-line-options. The task sequence can also be set to run with High Performance set via the Task Sequence Properties Performance tab, that sets the device to use High Performance for the duration of the task sequence.

step.name: Set Power Scheme to High Performance
